a.span: Virtual Classes are Available for all K-12 Students!

div.p: Recent legislation now allows Lathrop R-II students to take virtual classes through a program known as MOCAP. Click on "read more" below or contact one of our offices for...
Check out this awesome video put together by our LHS Student Council. It's actually a video to campaign for LHS to host the state student council meeting in March of 2021....

div.p: The American Heart Association has provided Lathrop School District with a valuable education and awareness tool. The CPR in Schools Kit contains 10 CPR manikins, lesson...

div.p: Here are our next three seniors to be recognized for the 2020 Senior Spotlight! Congrats to all three of you!
Reminder that we served two meals yesterday so no meals are being served today. Have a great weekend! #RollMules
Congratulations to the first three 2020 senior spotlights! I know this year didn't end the way you wanted it too, but we couldn't be more proud of you! More to come tomorrow!
Food truck is in Lathrop today providing FREE food to any and all families while it lasts starting at 10 a.m at the Goppert Center. Folks are already lining up! Don't miss out! #RollMules
